required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Alendronate Sodium Vitamin D3 Tablets on Knee Osteoarthritis
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Alendronate Sodium Vitamin D3 Tablets on Knee Joint Structure and Knee Osteoarthritis Pain: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled Study.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of alendronate sodium vitamin D3 tablets compared with placebo on the improvement of joint structure and joint pain in participants with knee osteoarthritis. The treatment period of this study is one year and followed-up period is 2 years. The results of knee joint MRI will be evaluated by using the WORMS score.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a multi-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study This study is planned to commence after obtaining Ethics Committee approval. participants will be randomised to a one-year course of alendronate sodium vitamin D3 tablets or placebo. 1:1 double blinded randomisation will be undertaken. This study plans to enroll 60 participants and will be carried out in three domestic centers (Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Zhongshan Hospital and The Third Affiliated Hospital of Southern Medical University) with a follow-up period of 2 years.
As the main goal of this exploratory study is to evaluate the effect of alendronate sodium vitamin D3 tablets compared with placebo on the improvement of joint structure and joint pain in participants with knee osteoarthritis. The primary outcome measure is WORMS score of knee joint MRI at 6 months and 12 months.

primary_outcome.measure: WORMS score of knee joint MRI
primary_outcome.description: WORM score of participants at the sixth month after enrollment

primary_outcome.measure: WORMS score of knee joint MRI
primary_outcome.description: WORM score of participants at the 12th month after enrollment

secondary_outcome.measure: WORMS score of knee joint MRI
secondary_outcome.description: WORM score of patients at the 24th month after enrollment
Pain intensity and symptom record of patients at the second week after enrollment
Pain intensity and symptom record of patients at the 4th week after enrollment
Pain intensity and symptom record of patients at the 8th week after enrollment
Pain intensity and symptom record of patients at the 12th week after enrollment

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life (the MOS item short from health survey,SF-36 )
secondary_outcome.description: SF-36 scale of patients at the third month after enrollment

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life (the MOS item short from health survey,SF-36 )
secondary_outcome.description: SF-36 scale of patients at the sixth month after enrollment. The score is calculated from eight dimensions, with the higher the final score the better

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life (the MOS item short from health survey,SF-36 )
secondary_outcome.description: SF-36 scale of patients at the 12th month after enrollment. The score is calculated from eight dimensions, with the higher the final score the better

secondary_outcome.measure: bone density (lumbar spine, hip joint and knee joint)
secondary_outcome.description: bone density of patients at the 12th month after enrollment

secondary_outcome.measure: bone density (lumbar spine, hip joint and knee joint)
secondary_outcome.description: bone density of patients at the 24th month after enrollment
Risk of knee replacement of patients at the 12th month after enrollment
Risk of knee replacement of patients at the 24th month after enrollment
KL-grading Score of patients at the 12th month after enrollment, 0 to Ⅳ, higher scores mean a worse outcome
KL-grading Score of patients at the 12th month after enrollment, 0 to Ⅳ, higher scores mean a worse outcome

secondary_outcome.measure: Serum IL-6, TNF-a, erythrocyte sedimentation rate, C-reactive protein
secondary_outcome.description: Serum inflammatory factor of patients at the third month after enrollment, IL-6 and TNF-a were measured in pg/ml,erythrocyte sedimentation rate was measured in mm/h, C-reactive protein was measured in mg/dL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Serum IL-6, TNF-a, erythrocyte sedimentation rate, C-reactive protein
secondary_outcome.description: Serum inflammatory factor of patients at the sixth month after enrollment, IL-6 and TNF-a were measured in pg/ml,erythrocyte sedimentation rate was measured in mm/h, C-reactive protein was measured in mg/dL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Serum IL-6, TNF-a, erythrocyte sedimentation rate, C-reactive protein
secondary_outcome.description: Serum inflammatory factor of patients at the 12th month after enrollment, IL-6 and TNF-a were measured in pg/ml,erythrocyte sedimentation rate was measured in mm/h, C-reactive protein was measured in mg/dL.

arm_group.description: participants will receive alendronate sodium vitamin D3 tablets once per week for one year.
participants will receive a placebo tablet once per week for one year.

intervention.description: once per week for one year
once per week for one year
